list.abstract: 中文名：追爱自由行导演：斯蒂芬·贝尔伯

yingyinNormal.en: That you're stepping away from the day-to-day management of the firm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对律所的日常管理有所怠慢。

yingyinNormal.en: I think we should merge. I disagree. They're offering us equal spots on management committees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我们应该合并。我不同意。他们给予我们一半的管理委员会席位。

yingyinNormal.en: Enter the Federal Aviation Administration, or FAA, which maintains our complex flight-management system today. Here's how it works.
yingyinNormal.zh: 进入联邦导航系统，它包括了我们现代复杂的航空管理系统，则是它的运作方式。

yingyinNormal.en: You can see their point. How could they have someone in the management of the new system who thinks the whole idea is a horrible mistake?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也明白他们的意思，他们怎么会让一个觉得新系统一无是处的人处在管理层呢？

yingyinNormal.en: 14? 14 is as high as they'll let any hosts go. You're in a management position. They want you to be smart. But not too smart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才14？14是他们设置的接待员最高值了，你处于管理者的位置，他们想让你聪明些。但不能太聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: The warriors' management sent Jeremy down to the D-league, the NBA's version of a minor league farm system. He was faced with a harsh reality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 勇士的管理层把林书豪下放到发展联盟，这是NBA的小型联盟育才体系，他面对着残酷的现实。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Red, given the severity of the crimes, I have no choice but to impose the maximum penalty allowed by the law. Anger management class.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胖红先生，鉴于你的罪行性质恶劣，我只能从重发落，对你判处法律规定范围内最严重的刑罚，接受愤怒管理课程。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No. Stan got on the management track at Home Depot. Oh, great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不不，他在家得宝零售店找了份工作。噢，太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: A man with breathtaking anger-management issues, a couple of master assassins, and you, big fella.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个脾气发作就要人命的大块头，还有一对精英杀手，而你呢，倒楣蛋。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the act of looking after and making decisions about something

examination_example.sentence: Microsoft bought task <highlight>management</highlight> app Wunderlist and mobile calendar Sunrise in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 微软在2015年收购了任务管理应用程序“奇妙清单”和移动日历“日出”。

examination_example.sentence: In effect, fewer federal funds today are going towards the agency's other work — such as forest conservation, watershed and cultural resources <highlight>management</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，如今越来越少的联邦资金用于该机构其他工作，如森林保护、流域和文化资源管理。

examination_example.sentence: What makes the problem thornier is that the usual time-<highlight>management</highlight> techniques don't seem sufficient.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使问题更加棘手的是，寻常的时间管理技巧似乎还不够。

examination_example.sentence: Fundamentally, the USPS is in a historic squeeze between technological change and a regulatory structure that denies <highlight>management</highlight> the flexibility to adjust its operations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从根本上说，美国邮政署正处于技术变革和监管结构之间的历史性挤压中，监管结构拒绝给予管理层调整其业务的灵活性。

examination_example.sentence: Women entering top <highlight>management</highlight> become headlines due to the lack of suitable public policies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进入高层管理的?女性成为头条新闻，是因为缺少适当的公共政策。

examination_example.sentence: In particular, the corporate workplace will never be completely family-friendly until women are part of senior <highlight>management</highlight> decisions, and Europe's top corporate-governance positions remain overwhelmingly male.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业的职场尤其如此，如果女性不参与高层决策，企业职场将永远不会彻底地为家庭着想，但绝大多数的欧洲顶级企业管理职位仍为男性所占据。

word_usage.usage:
the management 指某机关的全体主管人员，通常被看作复数，如：
The management have notified us of their decision.
主管人员已经把他们的决定通知了我们。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 管理；经营；设法继续生存；对付过去；处理；应付；主管；掌管；承受；当（运动队或演出者）的经理人

sense_info_list.en: the act of looking after and making decisions about something

examination_example.sentence: On the exercise's website, officials explain that the report they prepare during this rehearsal will inform disaster <highlight>management</highlight> for years to come.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在演习的网站上，官员们解释说，他们在这次演习中准备的报告可以为未来几年的灾难管理提供有用信息。

examination_example.sentence: In an academic analysis just published in the profoundly-respected Journal of <highlight>Management</highlight>, researchers have looked at the concept of "indifferent relationships".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篇刚刚发表在享有盛誉的《管理杂志》(Journal of Management)上的学术分析对“冷漠关系”进行了研究。

examination_example.sentence: This policy sets the stage for the Department of Commerce to take over the <highlight>management</highlight> of traffic in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该政策为商务部接管空间交通的管理奠定了基础。

sense_info_list.en: the people who look after and make decisions about something

examination_example.sentence: Consulting with <highlight>management</highlight> and legal teams beforehand is essential in order to comply with all laws.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了不违反法律，事先咨询管理层和法律团队至关重要。

examination_example.sentence: Seeking advice from <highlight>management</highlight> and legal experts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向管理和法律专家寻求建议。

examination_example.sentence: He will tell the <highlight>management</highlight> how he really feels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他会告诉管理层他的真实感受。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 非效率管理理论；无效率的管理

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: According to the public, at least, it's not that they lack toughness, <highlight>management</highlight> talent or proper skill sets. It's also not all about work-life balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少公众认为，这并不是因为他们缺乏韧性、管理才能或适当的技能。这也不全是工作与生活平衡的问题。

examination_example.sentence: At the same time, however, young working women are less likely than men to aim at top <highlight>management</highlight> jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，年轻的职业女性却不如男性一般对高层管理职位有着更高的追求。

examination_example.sentence: Inefficient <highlight>management</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无效率的管理。
